active_learning.discussion_prompt: How would you apply this concept in your work environment?
active_learning.peer_teaching: In pairs, select one NIST CSF 2.0 Govern subcategory (e.g., GV.RM Risk Management Strategy or GV.PO Policy). Explain it to your partner using a real-world example of leadership leading by example, then switch roles and provide feedback.
active_learning.problem_solving: In groups, design a 'leadership action plan' for a fictional company facing phishing risks. Incorporate 4-6 lead-by-example principles (e.g., leaders publicly advocating training), map to NIST GV categories, and present resource allocation decisions via role-play of a board meeting.
